name: Delivery Boy (Group 13)
description:
Note:

Recommended to run muted as the audio / sounds can sometimes bug causing them to loop indefinitely over each other.

Controls:

A and D -> Leaning and steering of bike

Arrow Left and Arrow Right -> left and right pedals. (Need to be be pressed in alternating pattern)

Credits:

  • Luke Whiting
  • Szymon Sadunski
  • Piotrek Golebiewski
  • Eleftherios Karakyritsis
